snippet: After the Night of the Stars charity pro-am pair tournament at the Wimbledon Bridge Club in London last month the players received commemorative booklets containing copies of the deals with hypothesized analyses.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played during the Night of the Stars charity pro-am pair tournament at the Wimbledon Bridge Club in London.
lead_paragraph: After the Night of the Stars charity pro-am pair tournament at the Wimbledon Bridge Club in London last month the players received commemorative booklets containing copies of the deals with hypothesized analyses.
